question: You have just spent a week with a friend on holiday. When you got home, you realised you had left your wallet there. Write a letter to your friend, in your letter;Thank your friend for the holidayexplain that you left your wallet in her houseGive her instructions on how to send it back to you.
text: Hope this letter finds you well. I landed safely in India yesterday. Firstly, I want to thank you once again for the warm hospitality you provided me. I really enjoyed my time with you. It was a much-needed break for me from the daily life and work stresses and the time spent with you refreshed me. For, next holidays, I invite you to my place.

But, there is an issue that I left my wallet at your house in the kitchen area and it has many important credit cards, receipts and identification proofs. In addition, my office pass was also left in that purse which I need daily in the office.

However, luckily one of my first cousins Ramesh, went to your city for an office meeting today. I asked him to bring my wallet from you and he agreed to that. I gave your phone number and address to him and he might call you once he will be free from the meeting. Give my wallet to him. Rest everything is fine and hope all is well from your side too.
